strings.schematron.title: MIG Validation Rules
strings.MIG12: Dataset or Series must have a valid reference date
strings.MIG16: Resource must have a valid responsible party
strings.MIG24: Dataset or Series must have a valid spatial resolution
strings.MIG25: Dataset or Series must have a valid spatial representation type
strings.MIG41: Dataset or Series must have a valid distribution format
strings.MIG52: Dataset or Series must have a bounding box extent
strings.MIG62: Must have information about Metadata Standard
strings.MIG66: Metadata must have a valid contact
strings.MIG70: Dataset or Series must have a valid data quality information
strings.MIG80: Metadata must have a valid spatial reference system

alert.MIG12B.div: Reference Date type must have one of these values: create, publication, revision.

alert.MIG13A.div: Resource must have a unique identifier.

alert.MIG16A.div: Must have at least one responsible party of type 'Point Of Contact'.

alert.MIG16B.div: Organisation name and email are required.

alert.MIG17A.div: Must have at least one keyword

alert.MIG17B.div: Missing service taxonomy information (select on or more keyword from "Classification of spatial data services" thesaurus)

alert.MIG24.div: Must have at least one spatial resolution.

alert.MIG24A.div: Spatial resolution cannot have both gmd:equivalentScale and gmd:distance, only one type must exists.

alert.MIG25.div: Must have at least one spatial representation type.

alert.MIG41.div: Must have at least one distribution format.

alert.MIG42.div: Must have at least one online resource.

alert.MIG42A.div: For a service, the online function code should be empty.

alert.MIG51.div: Cannot have more than one vertical extent.

alert.MIG52.div:
For a dataset or series, at least one extent of bounding box type has to be defined.
MD_Metadata.hierarchyLevel = 'dataset' || 'series (i.e. the default value of this property on the parent) implies count (extent.geographicElement.EX_GeographicBoundingBox)) >=1.

alert.MIG62.div: Must have information about the metadata standard name.

alert.MIG66A.div: Must have at least one metadata contact of type 'Point Of Contact'.

alert.MIG66B.div: Organisation name and email are required.

alert.MIG71.div: Need to have a scope equal to resource type.

alert.M72.div: Lineage is mandatory for spatial dataset and spatial dataset series.

alert.MIG80.div: Must have at least one spatial reference system.

alert.MIG81.div: Spatial reference system must have a code and namespace.
